segments.text: Do you think we should travel by bus or by train ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s a difficult choice . The train is a litter faster , but much more expensive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We could face delays if we travel by bus , thanks to traffic jams .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Buses are more cramped and you can ’ t walk around .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s true , but I feel that I see more when I travel by bus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I think you see more traveling by train .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , which form of transport do you prefer to use ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I prefer going by train , ever though it costs more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok them . We ’ ll go by train . I ’ m sure we ’ ll have a good journey . Shall we go to the station and buy the tickets ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The train aren ’ t usually full . We can get them on the day we travel . We should buy return ticket because they are much cheaper than getting two singles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We should take a packed lunch on the journey . The food they sell on the trains is always expensive .
segments.speaker: S1
